member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.EffectsProvider
member.summary: Provides smooth shadow and emboss effects for MindFusion.Diagramming nodes.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.EffectsProvider.MindFusion#Diagramming#IEffectsProvider#GenerateShadow(MindFusion.Diagramming.Diagram,System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath,System.Int32,MindFusion.Drawing.Brush)
member.summary: Generates a shadow for the specified shape.
member.param: The diagram that contains the shape.
A GraphicsPath object, which defines the shape.
The brush used to paint the shadow.
member.returns: A bitmap, containing the generated shadow.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.EffectsProvider.MindFusion#Diagramming#IEffectsProvider#GenerateEmboss(MindFusion.Diagramming.Diagram,System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath)
member.summary: Generates an emboss mask for the specified shape.
member.param: The diagram that contains the shape.
A GraphicsPath object which defines the shape.
member.returns: A bitmap, containing the generated emboss mask.
